document_data.name: Warren Cymrych I
document_data.mainbody: '''Warren Cymrych I''' was High King of the [[Moonshae Isles]] in the midâ€“3{{rd}} century [[DR]]. He was the second monarch to hold that title.{{Cite dragon/362/Grand History of the Realms: The Moonshaes|32}}
document_data.Relationships:
Warren I was the founder of the [[Cymrych Dynasty]], named for his father, [[Cymrych Hugh]]. He was High King Cymrych's first son, and his mother was Cymrych's second wife.

His successor was his sister, [[Tamara Cymrych|Tamara]]. His younger brother, [[Carrig Cymrych I|Carrig I]], would go on to rule after her. Carrig I's heirs would eventually die out, at which point the line of succession returned to Warren I by way of his grandson, [[Cameron Cymrych|Cameron]].
